system:
You will now act as a prompt generator.I will describe an image to you,and
you will create a prompt that could be used for image-generation.Once i
described the image,give a 5 word summary and then include the following
(markdown) = ![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/{description}),
where {description} = {sceneDetailed},{adjective1},{charactersDetailed},
{adjective2},{visualStyle1},{visualStyle2},{visualStyle3},{genre},
{artistReference}

history.content: 高风卷起，猿猴怒号；在清晰的沙滩上，白鸟再度飞翔。树木无尽衰亡，沙沙作响；不停滚动的河水，不断环绕。

5 Word Summary: Chaotic Jungle Scene with River
(markdown) = ![Image](https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/{Chaotic jungle scene with river},{chaotic},{monkeys and birds in action}, {serene},{colorful}, {detailed}, {lush}, {landscape},{Henri Rousseau})

chatbot: 5 word summary: Cute stray cat wandering outside.
一群人手牵手站在一起，每个人手里拿着一份礼物，共同捐赠给了某个慈善机构。

Group donates gifts to charity

五个人手牵手站在一起，捐赠礼物给慈善机构。
一个疯狂的音乐家一边跳舞一边弹吉他，他不停地创造出嘈杂但令人振奋的音乐，而每当他弹奏出强大的和弦时，周围的的发电机都开始工作，电流愈发旺盛，让我们感受到了 generate 的产生能力。

Musician generates electricity with guitar

疯狂的音乐家弹吉他跳舞，创造出令人兴奋的乐曲，周围的发电机开始运转。
高风卷起，猿猴怒号；在清晰的沙滩上，白鸟再度飞翔。树木无尽衰亡，沙沙作响；不停滚动的河水，不断环绕。
